definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

sentences.english: The night we rely on the tight, confusion of each other's heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕下我們靠的太緊，混淆了彼此的心跳。

sentences.english: Ancient man also noticed how the five planets visible to the naked eye twinkled in the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 古代的人們看到肉眼可見的五大行星在夜幕中閃爍。

sentences.english: First time, a girl and a boy, curved their little fingers and pulled a hook gently, under the curtain of night.
sentences.chinese: 一男一女真的在夜幕下第一次輕輕地用小手指拉了勾。

sentences.english: As night fell, work went on by oil lamp and candlelight.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕降臨時，僧侶們點起油燈和蠟燭，繼續幹活。

sentences.english: Out-side the litter night had fallen. Inside all was dark.
sentences.chinese: 轎外夜幕已經降臨，轎內也已經一片漆黑。

sentences.english: A night of depth, stretched to the horizon of the curtain of night is covering up my line of sight thickly.
sentences.chinese: 夜已深，一望無垠的夜幕厚厚實實地遮掩着我的視線。

sentences.english: Later, as night fell over the tumultuous capital, gunfire could be heard in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，夜幕降臨騷亂的首都，遠處傳來槍聲。

sentences.english: Night was falling when we walked the puppy out of the valley.
sentences.chinese: 當我們牽着小狗走出山谷時，夜幕已經降臨。

sentences.english: The homeless child dematerialized into the night.
sentences.chinese: 那個無家可歸的孩子消失在夜幕之中。

sentences.english: A wailful bagpipe played out in the night.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕中傳來悲哭般的風笛聲。

sentences.english: A cold wind was blowing, and night was falling.
sentences.chinese: 正颳着冷颼颼的風，夜幕正在降臨。

sentences.english: The land is enveloped in a curtain of darkness.
I felt golden ideas pouring from the dark blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 我感受到金光閃閃的點子從深藍色的夜幕傾瀉而下。

sentences.english: Quickly, we rode away into the night.
sentences.chinese: 很快地，我們騎馬消失在夜幕裏。

sentences.english: The earth would give a long sigh before sliding into darkness.
sentences.chinese: 地球在落入夜幕之前，會長長地嘆一口氣。

sentences.english: I have posted the pictures of Kuching old court house at night before.
sentences.chinese: 我之前曾貼過古晉舊法庭在夜幕低垂時的圖片。

definition: night scene/the dim light of night
early evening when lanterns are first lit
color of the sky/time of day, as indicated by the color of the sky/weather
